aboutData.sectionTitle: Find Peace at Pantai Kelapa Tuban
aboutData.sectionSubTitle: Hidden Paradise for Your Special Vacation – Create Unforgettable Memories on the Beach.
aboutData.title: Tuban Beach: Hidden Paradise in Java Island
aboutData.subTitle: Pantai Kelapa Tuban is one of the best beach tourism destinations in East Java, offering breathtaking natural scenery and a relaxing atmosphere for vacations. Located on Jalan Tuban – Gresik kilometer 1-2, Dusun Kepoh, Panyuran Village, Palang District, Tuban, East Java, this beach is a favorite choice for travelers seeking tranquility and stunning coastal views. Welcoming Ramadan and Eid al-Fitr 2025, Pantai Kelapa presents a special experience with ngabuburit while enjoying a mesmerizing sunset, a variety of Ramadan culinary delights, and an ideal setting for gatherings and halal bi-halal by the beach. Enjoy an unforgettable holiday at Pantai Kelapa, a top destination for Tuban beach tourism and East Java beach tourism!

call.title: Call Now
call.subTitle: If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.

department.sectionTitle: Explore the Wonders of Pantai Kelapa Tuban: Land, Sea, Air!
department.sectionSubTitle:
At Pantai Kelapa Tuban, the excitement never stops.
From refreshing water activities to thrilling land adventures, we have everything to make your vacation unforgettable.

desc.depart1: Enjoy the sensation of riding a horse on the beach.
desc.depart2: Explore the beauty of the Tuban sea with a traditional boat.
desc.depart3: Feel the sensation of adventure with ATV Bike along the beach.
desc.depart4: Feel the sensation of flying with Flying Fox above Tuban beach.
desc.depart5: Enjoy the freshness of the Tuban Beach swimming pool.
desc.depart6: The best photo spot to capture beautiful moments at Tuban Beach.
desc.depart7: Enjoy a beautiful night by camping at Tuban Beach.

Gallery.sectionSubTitle:
Let yourself be mesmerized by the beauty of Pantai Tuban through our photo gallery.
Witness breathtaking panoramas, unforgettable moments, and the vibrant colors of beach life.

Testimonial.sectionSubTitle:
Discover why Pantai Tuban is so special through stories from our happy guests.
Their testimonials are a testament to our commitment to creating unforgettable moments.

user.user1Comment: I just visited the place, it's clean, comfortable, and has camping too.
user.user2Comment: The beach is cool, perfect for family picnics, the attractions are complete and fun, and the entrance fee is affordable too.
user.user3Comment: So many memories at Pantai Kelapa... I had a great time camping there.
user.user4Comment: The place is aesthetic, perfect for hanging out with friends... camping is fun too while enjoying the sunset.

faq.sectionTitle: Tuban Beach FAQ: Answers to All Your Questions!

item1.title: Is Tuban Beach Open Every Day?
item1.desc: Yes, Tuban Beach is open daily from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM WIB.

item2.title: Does Tuban Beach Provide Parking Facilities?
item2.desc: Yes, Tuban Beach offers a spacious and secure parking area for private vehicles.

item3.title: Does Tuban Beach Have Restroom Facilities?
item3.desc: Yes, Tuban Beach provides clean and comfortable restroom facilities for visitors.

item4.title: Does Tuban Beach Offer Food and Beverage Services?
item4.desc: Yes, Tuban Beach has a variety of delicious and fresh food and drink options available.

item5.title: Does Tuban Beach Offer Snorkeling Equipment Rentals?
item5.desc: Yes, Tuban Beach provides snorkeling equipment rentals to explore the underwater beauty.
